description: जनता के हितों पर बात करने के लिए,मुश्किलों के निपटारे के लिए,मिलकर फैसला
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Delighted to participate in Inter-State Council meeting. Heard views of CMs & shared my thoughts on various topics. Reaffirmed the vitality of Centre & States working together for India's overall progress & bringing a qualitative change in people's lives.

Acceptance of Aadhaar as a means of good governance & transparency is gladdening. It ensures savings to exchequer & better service delivery. Had detailed discussion on education. I shared my view that focus must shift to quality of education, technology usage & learning outcomes.

The Council had comprehensive deliberations on law & order & various aspects around it. This is an important area of Centre-State cooperation. There were healthy discussions on Punchhi Commission recommendations today & we seek to continue discussions till a consensus is evolved.

I thank all those who shared their views today & assure that the suggestions will be worked on. http://nm-4.com/8ezs
